summary: Starts the Creation Kit without using the ENB d3d9.dll
descriptionHtml:
A simple BATCH file for starting the Creation Kit without ENB. No fancy VB script or such involved!!!

Instalation and Usage:
Simply but that CreationKit.bat file in your Skyrim Main directory Where the CreationKit.exe resides aswell. now simply start the kit with this CreationKit.bat file instead of using a link to the CreationKit.exe file.

If you run into problems with the UAC and/or having our steam dierectory on C: then run the batch file as administrator.

Dont mind the open dos window, it will close as soon you close the cretion kit.

Have fun!

Kidchaos
author: Kidchaos
